overview: Curvaceous kitten Sophia Rossi soared into the spotlight with films like Sophia Syndrome and Sophia Revealed. Now, Club Jenna's most voluptuous vixen takes you on a ride that'll have your heart racing and your palms sweating. Sexy Sophia leads a cast of your favorite stars through scene after slippery scene, tearing through all her most luxurious fantasies at breakneck speed. She's hell bent on driving you straight into a climax that'll leave your jaw hanging open and your muddled mind wondering where she's been all your life. Prepare yourself for a staggering journey that's both stylish and erotic. Prepare yourself for the Royale treatment.
title: Sophia Royale
